scripts.dev: npm run type-check && tsx  watch src/test/index.ts
scripts.patch: npm run build && npm version patch
scripts.minor: npm run build && npm version minor
scripts.major: npm run build && npm version major
scripts.pub:patch: npm run patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.pub:minor: npm run minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.pub:major: npm run major && npm publish --access public
